Name: 四季 The Four Seasons
About the game: Game type Story to \Immediate\Explore\Adventure\Action Introduction to the game The game is a four-character line, and the characters are in order: four Seasons, The main gameplay for each character is different. After the four character lines, open the game ending: Four Seasons Line, The customs clearance four season line will open the game after the day. spring: Taking the encounter of the character as a clue, Interspersed with the memories of the characters, Playing music as the main gameplay. summer: Taking the campus dispute as a clue, Solve the difficulties that come, To explore the puzzle as the main gameplay. autumn: Taking the case as a clue, Reasoning for the collection of clues in the case that occurred, And interspersed with the turn-based battle. winter: Get power as a clue, Crossing between illusions, Use the monster knife in your hand to fight the enemy. four seasons: It combines the spring, summer, autumn and winter games. It is the end of the whole story. Introduction of Persons Nuo Yan: a weak, awkward teenager, Often being bullied by others in school, Like He Qing in the same class, But I dare to look at her silently behind her. He Qing: School school flowers, Loved by many people, Often bring a smile on my face, Very sunny girl. Xu Nuo: Be humorous and serious, Popular with many girls, But my whereabouts are mysterious, Frequent absence in class. He Yue: Confused girl, The tragic situation made her become gloomy and lonely. Repressed by the painful life, I hope to escape from it.
